/* Rohit Kumar Jha */

#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#define lli long long int
#define gc getchar//_unlocked
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>

using namespace std;

void cal_lps(string patt, int lps[],int l)
{
    int i=0,j=1;
    lps[0]=0;
    while(j<l)
    {
        if(patt[i]==patt[j])
        {
            i++;
            lps[j]=i;
            j++;
        }
        else
        {
            if(i>0)i=lps[i-1];
            else {
                lps[j]=0;
                j++;
            }
        }
    }
}

int kmp(string str,string patt)
{
    int i=0,j=0,cnt=0;
    int n=str.length(),m=patt.length();
    int lps[1000005];
    cal_lps(patt,lps,m);

    while(j<n)
    {
        if(patt[i]==str[j])
        {
            i++;
            j++;

        }
        if(i==m)
        {
            cnt++;
            i=lps[i-1];
        }

        else if( j<n && patt[i]!=str[j])
        {
            if(i>0) i=lps[i-1];
            else j++;
        }
    }
    return cnt;
}


int main()
{
    string str,patt;
    int t,i,j,k,n,l;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    cin>>str;
    cin>>k;

    int lo=1,hi=str.length(),mid,cal,ans=0;
    while(lo<=hi){

        mid=(lo+hi)/2;
        patt.clear();
        for(i=0;i<mid;i++)patt.push_back(str[i]);

        //cout<<mid<<"  "<<hi<<"  "<<lo<<"   "<<patt<<endl;
        cal=kmp(str,patt);
        if(cal>=k){
            ans=mid;
            lo=mid+1;
        }
        else hi=mid-1;

    }

    cout<<ans<<endl;
    for(i=0;i<ans;i++)cout<<str[i];
    //cout<<endl;

    return 0;
}
